column4: hmm... quick question. seems that hoary + firefox 1.0.7 = a place you don't wanna go. but even removing backports from sources and apt-get updating, synaptic reports the current version as 1.0.7. any way to go back to an earlier version?
you can force a version of a package in synaptic
thanks for the suggestion. good to know about that option, but also don't want funky dependencies!
that wouldn't be "struggling", now would it ;-)
